page.title: 10TRANSPORT
page.content: The{Eastern National Bus Company} provide an adequate public service to Maldon, the nearest town,and to Bradwell-on-Sea,including the villages of Asheldham and Tillingham.Because of lack of support it is likely these daily services will be curtailed in the future.There is also a coach service for holidays both at home and abroad. A local bus firm{Fords}provide transport for children to the Comprehensive School in Burnham-on-Crouch also Package Holidays and daily excursions. {Asda Supermarket}at Woodham Ferrers operate a Free Shoppers Bus 3 times per week. Also coming into Southminster from outlying villages is a Free Shoppers Bus on Thursdays.
